author: wn.com
title: UNG adds second study-abroad option to high school summer language program (University of North Georgia) ...
text: ( Source : University of North Georgia ) Next year, the University of North Georgia ( UNG ) will offer three-week study abroad programs in Germany and France as part of a summer language program for high school students. Each summer, UNG offers
